GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v4.9.311
GSD.description:
media: usb: go7007: s2250-board: fix leak in probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit bbdd0e15738336e6b1208304ae98525117877bbd, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit d3b2ccd9e307eae80b4b4eeb0ede46cb02212df2. For more details please see the references link.
